articles.title: Biden unveils $1.75 trillion spending plan paid for by taxing billionaires
articles.description: President Joe Biden unveiled a $1.75 trillion spending plan that would be paid for by taxing billionaires and corporations. The plan includes funding for education, healthcare, and climate initiatives.

articles.title: Facebook whistleblower Frances Haugen says company prioritizes profit over safety
articles.description: Facebook whistleblower Frances Haugen testified before Congress, stating that the company prioritizes profit over user safety. She called for regulation to hold tech companies accountable for their actions.

articles.title: Tesla reports record profit in third quarter
articles.description: Tesla reported a record profit in the third quarter, driven by strong sales of its electric vehicles. The company also announced plans to open new factories in Texas and Germany.
